name: A Number's life
description: A Number's life is a minimalistic yet surprisingly complex game based on moving, combining and dividing numbers. Meet these wonderful characters and test your skills through 80 fun and challenging levels. Create your own levels and share them with the community.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz+ or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 63 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
